title: Report: Child Grazed By Bullet
content:
Goldsboro Police are investigating a report a child was grazed by a bullet early Wednesday afternoon.
While police have not released any official information early reports indicate a grandmother told authorities her 11-year-old granddaughter had been struck by the bullet while at an area store where there was an alleged shooting. She said the bullet grazed her granddaughter’s hand which was bleeding and turning blue.
Police responded to the residence in the 500 block of Stadium Drive where the emergency call was placed. Wayne County EMS was also called to the scene.
Goldsboro Police will release an official report following their ongoing investigation.
